original_text: “‘If you offer an animal from the flock as a fellowship offering to the Lord, you are to offer a male or female without defect.
korean_text: 만일 여호와께 예물로 드리는 화목제의 제물이 양이면 수컷이나 암컷이나 흠 없는 것으로 드릴지며

sentences.original_text: If you offer an animal from the flock
as a fellowship offering to the Lord
you are to offer a male or female
